WorkItem.Description: This week, For both addon and website, when toon loaded from Battlenet, some old items are not being found in WoWhead.  Toon's stats are not calculated correctly; reforging not calculated.  For example, 359 Power Generation Hood for Malynn-Hyjal is not showing reforging.  Malynn's hit is being calculated at 5.84% when it's 16.81%.
WorkItem.Summary: Items not being found in WoWHead

FileAttachments.FileName: US Malynn Hyjal in Rawr with Incorrect infomration 6-13-11.xml

Comments.Message: Your going to have to post your character xml file because the Power Generation Hood is in the database.

Power Generation Hood is in WoWhead database, but when I pull it into Rawr, I'm getting the message that it is not. I'm not good with computers, which is one of the reasons I love Rawr.. it's so easy to use.  Here is my mage from the armory:  http://us.battle.net/wow/en/character/hyjal/malynn/simple    I hope the file below is what you need to see my toon as it appears on Rawr.

Well, I'm not sure what is going on. I tried both the latest unreleased version of RAWR as well as the official release we released last night and both are coming up as being able to load the helm. Try getting last nights release and see what happens.

The Power Generation icon appears in Rawr when I load the toon.  However, when you mouse over the icon, there is a note at the bottom of the pop-up window that says it isn't found in WoWHead (I think it's the geming/reforging combinations that are not found).  The hood is just one item of several items that are this way for my toon.
Have you tried resetting your Item Cache? You maybe using an old item cache.

Today Rawr works again.  I used the new release.  The new release asked me to reset the item cache, which I did.  Not sure which action caused things to work again, but I can use by beloved Rawr again!  :D  
Thank you.
